dict.string: Copyright 2010 Kosada Incorporated. All rights reserved.

This patch renders its subpatches multiple times --- once for each element in the provided structure, after applying the specified transformation.
Each transformation structure can contain the following subelements: X,Y,Z: Translation SX,SY,SZ: Scale RX,RY,RZ: Rotation
http://kineme.net/
Structure of transformations to apply to internal geometry. Each transformation structure can contain the following elements: X,Y,Z: Translation SX,SY,SZ: Scale RX,RY,RZ: Rotation
